language.name: English (UK)
Name
language.captcha_help: Type the words as you see them. This stops 'virus' programs from signing up.
language.confirm_delete: Really delete this? This cannot be undone.
language.password_help: Must be between 5 and 12 characters, contain at least one digit and one alphabetic character, and must not contain special characters.
language.loginfail: The email address or password is incorrect. Please try again!
language.activationsuccess: Thank you for activating your account. You can now use the website as a member.
language.no_permission: You do not have sufficient permission to access this resource.
language.temp_pass: A temporary password will be sent to the new user's email address.
language.saved_user_error: There was an error saving the user.
language.saved_user_group_error: There was an error saving the user group.
language.invalid_user_name: Invalid user Name. Ensure the name is at least 3 characters long.
language.invalid_user_display_name: Invalid user Display Name. Ensure the display name is at least 3 characters long.
language.invalid_user_contact_number: Invalid user Contact Number. Please enter the digits only; phone numbers are required to be at least 7 digits long.
language.must_complete_form: Please ensure all required fields are completed.
language.deleted_user_error: There was an error deleting the user.
language.deleted_user_group: Successfully deleted the user group. Users in this group have been deactivated; You should re-activate them now.
language.deleted_user_group_error: There was an error deleting the user group.
language.no_action_error: I'm not sure what you're trying to do.
language.registration_invalid_name: Invalid name. Ensure the name contains at least 3 characters.
language.registration_invalid_password: Invalid password selected. Password must be between 5 and 12 characters, contain at least one digit and one alphabetic character, and must not contain special characters.
language.registration_password_mismatch: The passwords you entered did not match. Please ensure you type the same password twice!
language.registration_complete: Registration complete! Please note you must validate your account before you have full access. Within a few minutes, you will receive an email message with a validation link.
